thread.title: INSIGHT: Historic opera staged at Egypt's Pyramids

title: INSIGHT: Historic opera staged at Egypt's Pyramids
text:
INSIGHT: Historic opera staged at Egypt's Pyramids Sunday, March 11, 2018 - 00:58 
The Giza Pyramids hosted the epic Opera Aida, a tale of love and betrayal in ancient Egypt.Nearly 2,800 people attended the historic performance held for the first time since 2009 against the backdrop of the Pyramids and the Sphinx.
